archimate:ArchimateDiagramModel.name: Manage TSS Applicant View
archimate:ArchimateDiagramModel.documentation: Ability to search for current employees or candidates based on: • skill set • precise keyword or phrases • location • location groupings- e.g.- Victoria and surrounding area b) Ability to save searches c) Easy to view and see candidate notes. • Ability to save candidates • Ability to have multiple current shortlists of candidates with the ability to connect them with an open order • Ability to name shortlists- example ‘Admin 2’
